utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: So who's idea was it to put everybody in the diner on skates?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, some idiot customer put a suggestion in the suggestion box.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh my God, they took my idea!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: That was you?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah! Okay, here you go.

utterance.content: Rachel, I made you a cocoa.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh my God, are you guys okay?

utterance.speaker: Gunther
utterance.content: Are you all right?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey. Y'know with that goatee you kinda look like Satan.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, so that's why the priest threw holy water on me. Okay, listen, you have to cheer up! Okay? You should come out with Ross and me, I mean anything is better than sitting around here crying all day about Kate.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey I was crying because, because nobody believed Quincy's theory. Okay?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I'm gonna be on TV!!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No way!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah! They're putting together this panel to talk about these fossils they just found in Peru and The Discovery Channel's gonna film it!

utterance.content: Oh my God! Who's gonna watch that?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Thanks. You ready to go?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.content: Saw a girl with that vest.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Thanks.

utterance.speaker: Anchorwoman
utterance.content: While most of us think of chocolate bunnies and baskets as traditional Easter gifts. Some people insist on giving live chicks as presents. Unfortunately, the sad fact remains that most of these little guys won't live to see the fourth of July. Because of as a result of improper care, they will be dead.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, hi. You guys got any of those baby chicks? 'Cause I was watching this ah, commercial on TV and man, those guys are cute!

utterance.speaker: Pete
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hi! Hey, Pete you're back! Hey, check this out.

utterance.speaker: Pete
utterance.content: Wow! Skates!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Wow! You're a lot sturdier that Chandler. He crumpled like a piece of paper. So how was you're trip?

utterance.speaker: Pete
utterance.content: Well...

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, what'd ya bring me?! Awww, hotel toiletries from Japan. Oh, these are gonna go in my permanent collection. You want some coffee?

utterance.speaker: Pete
utterance.content: Yeah, sure, that'd be great.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Regular or decaf?

utterance.speaker: Pete
utterance.content: Ah, which ever is closest.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Pete
utterance.content: So ask me what I did today.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: So what did you do today Pete?

utterance.speaker: Pete
utterance.content: I bought a restaurant and I would like you to be the head chef.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What?! Oh.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Can you believe he just offered me a restaurant?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What a jerk! You want me to kick his ass?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I mean this has been like my dream since I got my first Easy Bake Oven and opened Easy Monica's Bakery. I mean I would kill for this job. I mean I can totally do this job, and God knows I paid my dues. But Pete's just doing this because he has a crush on me.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: And you're still not attracted to him at all?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hmm, no. I mean how can I accept a restaurant from hi-? I-I-I-I can't. I couldn't even accept a necklace from Stu Vincent in the seventh grade.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, but Mon that's totally different. He was you're health teacher.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, please.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What? Honey.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, I am, my side still hurts from when you crashed into me yesterday.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh God, I'm so sorry.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I know.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ow!!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh God!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey, you guys! Guess what?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Got a job on a river boat?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Y'know what I didn't wear this suit for a year because you hated it. Well, guess what? You're not my girlfriend anymore so...

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh I see, so this suit is making a point.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Right.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Now that you're on you're own, you're free to look as stupid as you like.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You like it right?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh absolutely. I like it even more on you than I did on Colonel Sanders. Ross! Ross! I'm kidding!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, come here!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What-what was it you were gonna tell us?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah. Oh! Was how you invented the cotton gin?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, good bye!

utterance.content: So um, after you put the suggestion in the box, how long did it take for the roller skating thing to happen.

utterance.content: It's cute, huh?

utterance.content: Fowl? No. Women? Nooo.

utterance.content: Okay, well they are a huge responsibility, especially at this age. They require constant care. They-they need just the right food, and lot's and lot's of love.

utterance.content: Oh, well no problem there.

utterance.speaker: Chandler

utterance.content: So? I mean have you thought about it?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay. Here's the thing.

utterance.content: Oh no, not the thing. I hate the thing. What's the thing?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I can't do it. I'm sorry, I wish I could, but umm, see you have these feelings for me....

utterance.speaker: Pete
utterance.content: Wait, wait, wait, wait, that's-that's what you're worried about? If that's the problem, we've got no problem.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Huh?

utterance.speaker: Pete
utterance.content: No! Look, I was gonna tell you this over dinner, but I met somebody else. On my trip.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh?

utterance.speaker: Pete
utterance.content: Her name's Ann, she's a journalist. Ahh, we met on the plane. She asked me if she could finish off my peanuts, I thought she said something else, we had a big laugh. Yeah, I just, I mean I got, I got tired of waiting.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, that's great! I mean I'm-I'm sorry, but I'm so happy for you. And now I can work for you!

utterance.speaker: Pete
utterance.content: I guess you can.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my God! Oh, this is incredible! Ohh! All right, y'know what? I'm just gonna roll right into that office and-and quit!

utterance.content: All right.

utterance.content: Yeah, no, I'm fairly intuitive and psychic. It's a substantial gift.

utterance.content: Absolutely, oh I promise. Tell her what?

utterance.content: Thanks a lot.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, but this is the last time. With a chick-chick here, and a chick-chick there. Here a chick, there a chick, everywhere a chick-chick- -chickeeeen.

utterance.content: Excuse me?

utterance.content: What?

utterance.content: I stayed home from work today while you were at rehearsal so somebody could be here with our chick!

utterance.content: Hey! Who was up from 2 o'clock this morning until 5 o'clock this morning trying to get her back to sleep?

utterance.content: You don't think I get up when you get up?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ohhh, here it comes.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes, here it comes! I'm stuck here all day, and then you come in and spend two seconds with us and then expect to go off gallivanting with your friends? Well I don't think so mister!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: And you don't think taking care of our chick is work?

utterance.content: I know what you meant!! You notice that ever since we got this chick, we've been fighting a lot more than we used too?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I'll take her back tomorrow.

utterance.speaker: Joey

utterance.content: Ohhh, hey! All right, listen, I-I have that TV thing in like two hours, and I need your help, okay? What do you think? This blue suit, or this brown one?

utterance.content: Rachel, I've seen you naked a million times. I ate hot fudge off you naked. Remember, I-I sucked that mini-marshmallow out of your belly button?

utterance.content: Yeah, but that was different. Y'know? I mean, we were, we were going out then, now I think it's weird.

utterance.content: Look, the only who stands to get hurt is me. And I'm okay with that.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You may be okay about getting hurt, but I am not okay with being the one who hurts you. That's why I can't take this job.

utterance.speaker: Pete
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: And well, we probably shouldn't see each other anymore. I'm sorry.

utterance.speaker: Pete
utterance.content: Okay, yeah. I mean... If that's, if that's really what you want, okay.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Okay, bye.

utterance.speaker: Pete
utterance.content: I'm sorry things didn't work out...

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: All right shut up for a second and let me just see something. Oh, wow!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, you'd tell me the truth. Right?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Rach, you can't look fat in an x-ray.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay! Now you stay out here, and you think about what you did!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: That's a duck.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: That's a bad duck!!! How'd the thing go tonight, Ross?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, it was, nah, well....

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What thing? What thing?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Nothing, ah there was this thing at the museum. Come on. Easy.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, now when you come back I hope you remember that, that chick is not a toy!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What thing? What is this thing?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I was kinda, supposed to be on TV tonight for The Discovery Channel.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my God!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ross, why didn't you tell me that?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Eh, 'cause I knew that if I told you, you'd make me go, and I knew you needed someone to be with you tonight. Come on. Come on.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I cannot believe you.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: That is the sweetest thing, I just....

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You should get some sleep.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So, I'll umm...

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, I'm sorry I spoiled you're evening.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, that's, no, as long as you're okay. So I'll ah, I'll see you tomorrow.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Um-hmm, yeah.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: See ya.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What did you do?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What 'cha doing?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Having a swim.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What about the chick?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Chicks don't swim.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Are you sure?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I don't know. Should we try it?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Sure.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: See, I told you they don't swim.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Wait. Give him a minute.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Noo! Oh, it's okay, it's okay, baby, baby, baby.
